author: makortel
body:
Reverts cms-sw/cmssw#35180 ASAN pointed out problems with the PR in master, see https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/issues/34873#issuecomment-916136092 for more details.

Sorry for the trouble, should have checked things more carefully in master first.
title: Revert "[10_6_X] Have embedded root files send close reports"
